description.short: A open-source Python 3 package for plasma physics.
description.long: PlasmaPy is an open-source community developed Python 3 package for plasma physics.  PlasmaPy intends to be a collection of functionality commonly used and shared between plasma physicists and researchers globally.
tofu stands for Tomography for Fusion. tofu is an IMAS-compatible open-source machine independent python library with non-open source plugins containing machine-dependent routines.
